verses.plain: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee; and the mother of Jesus was there:

tokens.t: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee; and the mother of Jesus was there:

verses.plain: And both Jesus was called, and his disciples, to the marriage.

tokens.t: And both Jesus was called, and his disciples, to the marriage.

verses.plain: And when they wanted wine, the mother of Jesus saith unto him, They have no wine.

tokens.t: And when they wanted wine, the mother of Jesus saith unto him, They have no wine.

verses.plain: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, what have I to do with thee? mine hour is not yet come.

tokens.t: Jesus saith unto her,
Woman, what have I to do with thee? mine hour is not yet come.

verses.plain: His mother saith unto the servants, Whatsoever he saith unto you, do it.

tokens.t: His mother saith unto the servants, Whatsoever he saith unto you, do

verses.plain: And there were set there six waterpots of stone, after the manner of the purifying of the Jews, containing two or three firkins apiece.

tokens.t: And there were set there six waterpots of stone, after the manner of the purifying of the Jews, containing two or three firkins apiece.

verses.plain: Jesus saith unto them, Fill the waterpots with water. And they filled them up to the brim.

tokens.t: Jesus saith unto them,
Fill the waterpots with water.
And they filled them up to the brim.

verses.plain: And he saith unto them, Draw out now, and bear unto the governor of the feast. And they bare it.

tokens.t: And he saith unto them,
Draw out now, and bear unto the governor of the feast.
And they bare

verses.plain: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine, and knew not whence it was: (but the servants which drew the water knew;) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom,

tokens.t: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine, and knew not whence it was: (but the servants which drew the water knew;) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom,

verses.plain: And saith unto him, Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine; and when men have well drunk, then that which is worse: but thou hast kept the good wine until now.

tokens.t: And saith unto him, Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine; and when men have well drunk, then that which is worse:
thou hast kept the good wine until now.

verses.plain: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee, and manifested forth his glory; and his disciples believed on him.

tokens.t: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee, and manifested forth his glory; and his disciples believed on him.

verses.plain: ¶ After this he went down to Capernaum, he, and his mother, and his brethren, and his disciples: and they continued there not many days.

tokens.t: ¶ After this he went down to Capernaum, he, and his mother, and his brethren, and his disciples: and they continued there not many days.

verses.plain: ¶ And the Jews’ passover was at hand, and Jesus went up to Jerusalem,

tokens.t: ¶ And the Jews’ passover was at hand, and Jesus went up to Jerusalem,

verses.plain: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves, and the changers of money sitting:

tokens.t: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves, and the changers of money sitting:

verses.plain: And when he had made a scourge of small cords, he drove them all out of the temple, and the sheep, and the oxen; and poured out the changers’ money, and overthrew the tables;

tokens.t: And when he had made a scourge of small cords, he drove them all out of the temple, and the sheep, and the oxen; and poured out the changers’ money, and overthrew the tables;

verses.plain: And said unto them that sold doves, Take these things hence; make not my Father’s house an house of merchandise.

tokens.t: And said unto them that sold doves,
Take these things hence; make not my Father’s house an house of merchandise.

verses.plain: And his disciples remembered that it was written, The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up.

tokens.t: And his disciples remembered that it was written, The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up.

verses.plain: ¶ Then answered the Jews and said unto him, What sign shewest thou unto us, seeing that thou doest these things?

tokens.t: ¶ Then answered the Jews and said unto him, What sign shewest thou unto us, seeing that thou doest these things?

verses.plain: Jesus answered and said unto them, Destroy this temple, and in three days I will raise it up.

tokens.t: Jesus answered and said unto them,
Destroy this temple, and in three days I will raise it up.

verses.plain: Then said the Jews, Forty and six years was this temple in building, and wilt thou rear it up in three days?

tokens.t: Then said the Jews, Forty and six years was this temple in building, and wilt thou rear it up in three days?

verses.plain: But he spake of the temple of his body.

tokens.t: But he spake of the temple of his body.

verses.plain: When therefore he was risen from the dead, his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them; and they believed the scripture, and the word which Jesus had said.

tokens.t: When therefore he was risen from the dead, his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them; and they believed the scripture, and the word which Jesus had said.

verses.plain: ¶ Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover, in the feast day, many believed in his name, when they saw the miracles which he did.

tokens.t: ¶ Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover, in the feast
, many believed in his name, when they saw the miracles which he did.

verses.plain: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them, because he knew all men,

tokens.t: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them, because he knew all

verses.plain: And needed not that any should testify of man: for he knew what was in man.

tokens.t: And needed not that any should testify of man: for he knew what was in man.
